query.title: Query
query.prefill: What is the first 30 videos on the @openai YouTube channel?
query.default: This is a fallback test query, do nothing and !!do not call any tools!!. If asked to generate structured response, create a dummy one without optional fields - minimal as possible.

modelName.title: OpenAI model
modelName.description: The OpenAI model to use. Currently supported models are gpt-4o and gpt-4o-mini, and the reasoning models o1 and o3-mini.

openaiApiKey.title: OpenAI API Key
openaiApiKey.description: Your OpenAI API key. You can also set it as an environment variable OPENAI_API_KEY. Get your API key from https://platform.openai.com/api-keys

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: If enabled, the Actor will run in debug mode and produce more output.
